Title: How to efficiently clean up disk space in windows 11?
Author: TimereMachine
Description:
Hi,

I don't know why my disk is full. The c drive takes about 100 GB storage after Windows 11 update. I've already used Disk Cleanup and Storage Sense, but I'm still struggling with low disk space. Are there any advanced methods or tools to efficiently **clean up disk space in windows 11**? I suspect there might be hidden large files or old Windows update leftovers taking up space.

Thanks in advance for your help!
EnhancedContent:
Hi,

I don't know why my disk is full. The c drive takes about 100 GB storage after Windows 11 update. I've already used Disk Cleanup and Storage Sense, but I'm still struggling with low disk space. Are there any advanced methods or tools to efficiently **clean up disk space in windows 11**? I suspect there might be hidden large files or old Windows update leftovers taking up space.

Thanks in advance for your help!
